name: Manish Singh Parihar
title: Full Stack & AI Engineer
bio: A versatile engineer specializing in both Full Stack Development and Artificial Intelligence. Experienced in building modern web applications with Next.js and FastAPI, as well as developing AI solutions including computer vision systems, language models, and intelligent document processing systems. Passionate about creating innovative solutions that combine cutting-edge AI with robust web technologies.

blogs.title: Fine-tune Llama 32 Vision Language Model on Custom Datasets
blogs.excerpt: Learn how to fine-tune the Llama 32 Vision Language Model for your specific use cases with custom datasets.

blogs.title: A Beginner's Guide to Evaluating RAG Systems with LangSmith
blogs.excerpt: Discover how to effectively evaluate Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems using LangSmith.

blogs.title: Running Multiple Open-Source LLMs Locally with Ollama
blogs.excerpt: A comprehensive guide on setting up and running various open-source Large Language Models locally using Ollama.

blogs.title: Building Your Own LLM RAG Chatbot with Neo4j and LangChain
blogs.excerpt: Step-by-step guide to creating a RAG-powered chatbot using Neo4j graph database and LangChain framework.

projects.name: ReddiChat
projects.description: An intelligent AI chatbot that combines advanced language models with real-time Reddit insights. Features Google OAuth authentication, persistent chat history, and smart tool selection for enriched conversations with community perspectives from Reddit discussions.

projects.name: Novel Writing AI with LLaMA 3.1
projects.description: Fine-tuned LLaMA 3.1 model specifically for novel writing. Created a custom dataset of epic novels and trained the model to generate high-quality narrative content. The model is publicly available on Hugging Face for the writing community.

projects.name: Fire Detection System
projects.description: Developed a real-time fire detection system using YOLOv5, capable of identifying fires through camera feeds. Provides an alternative to traditional smoke detectors with visual detection capabilities.

projects.name: Video Super Resolution using GFPGAN
projects.description: Developed a video enhancement system using GFPGAN model to upscale and improve video quality. The system processes videos frame by frame, enhancing visual quality and allowing users to download the improved videos.

projects.name: Dumroo.ai Admin Chatbot
projects.description: AI-powered student data analytics platform with role-based access control. Features real-time WebSocket chat, OpenAI GPT-4o integration, and beautiful data visualization. Supports multiple user roles with different data access levels for educational institutions.

projects.name: Globetrotter
projects.description: Real-time geography quiz game testing knowledge of world cities. Features score tracking, achievement system, instant feedback, and responsive design. Built with modern architecture using TanStack Query for data fetching and Redis caching for optimal performance.

projects.name: Loan Advisor Chatbot
projects.description: Intelligent financial advisory chatbot that matches borrowers with suitable lenders using machine learning. Features conversational UI, real-time scoring algorithm, and displays top 3 lender recommendations with explanations. Built with modern tech stack and containerized deployment.

projects.name: Transcriber
projects.description: Built an AI-powered tool that automatically generates captions and transcripts for YouTube videos in 67 languages, with summarization capabilities in 133 languages. Integrates multiple language models for accurate transcription and translation.

projects.name: Medical Chatbot using Llama2
projects.description: Created an intelligent healthcare chatbot powered by Llama2 that answers medical queries based on provided documentation. Implements RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) for accurate and context-aware responses.

projects.name: Shortify
projects.description: Modern URL shortener with real-time analytics, Redis caching, and beautiful responsive UI. Built with Next.js 14 & FastAPI, featuring async operations, click tracking, and scalable architecture designed for high traffic.

projects.name: Know Your PPT
projects.description: Innovative tool that converts PowerPoint files into semantically rich text using vision language models. Enables better understanding and analysis of presentation content.

projects.name: Deep Speech 2
projects.description: Implementation of the Deep Speech 2 model for speech-to-text conversion. Trained on a comprehensive dataset of audio recordings for real-time transcription capabilities.

projects.name: Data Wizard
projects.description: Comprehensive data analysis and visualization platform. Features automated data cleaning, statistical analysis, and interactive visualizations for better data insights.

experience.description: Developing intelligent document processing systems and advanced chatbots. Building AI-powered solutions for automated document analysis and information retrieval.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
